posts.post_content:
Hi, I have been a T206 collector of PSA graded (3s and 4s) portraits for quite some time.  I am on the PSA Set Registry.

I have decided to branch out some and collect a Polar Bear back subset (primarily action pictures to start since I have been focused portraits). 

Just purchased an initial small group from a Net54 member.  Starting to look for other groups or singles.

I am planning to do this back subset primarily ungraded....low to mid grade is fine considering my budget.

I have a Kleinow, Boston, PSA 2.5.
Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] if interested.
